U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

metadata.title: Erowid Fentanyl Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Fentanyl.

content:
Drug: Fentanyl | cid: 3345
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Fentanyl.
Erowid name: fentanyl
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Your donation supports practical, accurate info about psychoactive plants & drugs. We accept 9 cryptocurrencies. Contribute a bit today!

Fentanyl

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Fentanyl REGULATED Yes STATUS Scheduled SCHEDULE Schedule II CLASSIFICATION Opiate

Fentanyl is Schedule II in the United States. This means it is illegal to sell without a DEA license and illegal to buy or possess without a license or prescription.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Australia #

Fentanyl is a border controlled substance under Criminal Code Act 9.1.314 and is additionally controlled by several states and territories. (thanks Z)

Canada #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides an overview of the legal status of fentanyl, beginning with a summary of U.S. federal law and continuing with international regulations in countries like Australia and Canada. It appears within Erowid's broader index covering the legal status, effects, and user experiences related to various pharmaceuticals and psychoactive substances.

metadata.title: Erowid Fentanyl Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Fentanyl.

content:
Drug: Fentanyl | cid: 3345
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Fentanyl.
Erowid name: fentanyl
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Australia #

Fentanyl is a border controlled substance under Criminal Code Act 9.1.314 and is additionally controlled by several states and territories. (thanks Z)

Canada #

Fentanyl is schedule I in Canada. (Note: Canadian schedules are very different than U.S. schedules). In at least some parts of Ontario, those prescribed fentanyl patches must return their used patches in order to receive prescription refills. See http://www.pcchu.ca/2014/02/18/local-healthcare-providers-collaborate-to-address-misuse-of-fentanyl-in-peterborough/ and http://www.mykawartha.com/news-story/4905577-fentanyl-patch-program-aims-to-reduce-accidental-overdoses/. One visitor tells us that this policy will be implemented for all of Ontario as of Jan 1, 2015, but we've been unable to find confirmation of that. (thanks G) (last updated Oct 13 2014)

Italy (Italia) #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk lists the legal status of fentanyl in specific countries outside the United States (Australia, Canada, Italy) as part of Erowid's broader fentanyl legal status page, which summarizes fentanyl's regulation under U.S. federal law and internationally, offering up-to-date details on scheduling, restrictions, and related policies.

metadata.title: Erowid Fentanyl Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Fentanyl.

content:
Drug: Fentanyl | cid: 3345
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Fentanyl.
Erowid name: fentanyl
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Italy (Italia) #

Listed in Tabella I of "Tabelle delle sostanze stupefacenti e psicotrope", making it illegal to possess, purchase, or sell. (see Tabelle delle sostanze stupefacenti e psicotrope. (thanks a) (last updated Dec 16, 2015)

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.

RELATED RESOURCES #

RELATED LINKS #

Heroin Law

Created by Erowid - Feb 21, 2003 Modified - May 10, 2016


                    Context: 
                    This section appears within a broader Erowid webpage detailing the legal status of fentanyl in various countries. Specifically, it summarizes the regulation of fentanyl in Italy, stating that it is illegal to possess, purchase, or sell under Italian law. The surrounding content includes similar legal summaries for other countries, general caution about the reliability of legal information, and related legal resource links.
